entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Williams Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -10.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Williams Lake Airport 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -10.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -12.4°C
Wind: ESE 24 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm near the Cariboo mountains. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm near the Cariboo mountains. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
